name: resourceType
description: The type of resource being stored and annotated

enumValues.description: Any file derived from or pertaining to a scientific experiment. experimentalData annotations should be applied, possibly disease-related
Any file derived from analysis such that the analysis annotations might apply, possibly disease-related
Any file or link that represents a tool, model, or algorithm; the tool annotations could be applied

name: fundingAgency
description: The organization providing financial support for generation of this data.

enumValues.description: Childrens' Tumor Foundation
National Institutes of Health - National Cancer Institute
Neurofibromatosis Therapeutic Acceleration Program
National Institutes of Health - National Institute of Aging
National Institutes of Health - National Institute of Mental Health
American Association for Cancer Research
CommonMind Consortium
PsychENCODE Consortium
Accelerating Medicines Partnership-Alzheimer's Disease
Model Development and Evaluation for Late Onset AD
Molecular Mechanisms of the Vascular Etiology of Alzheimer's Disease
Brain Somatic Mosaicism Network
Cancer Systems Biology Consortium
Physical Science in Oncology
Genomics Evidence Neoplasia Information Exchange
Data derived from the CTF-funded NF1 pre-clinical model Synodos project
Data derived from the CTF-funded NF2 Synodos project
Data derived from the CTF-funded NF1 LGG Synodos project
Data from the D-HART SPORE

name: fileFormat
description: Defined format of the data file, typically corresponding to extension, but sometimes indicating more general group of files produced by the same tool or software

enumValues.description: Bash Shell Script

Holds a tab-delimited chromosome /start /end / datavalue dataset. The bedGraph format allows display of continuous-valued data in track format. This display type is useful for probability scores and transcriptome data

Proprietary file format for (raw) BeadArray data used by genomewide profiling platforms from Illumina Inc. This format is output directly from the scanner and stores summary intensities for each probe-type on an array.
BAM format, the binary, BGZF-formatted compressed version of SAM format for alignment of nucleotide sequences (e.g. sequencing reads) to (a) reference sequence(s)
BAM indexing format
Microsoft Excel spreadsheet format
Microsoft Powerpoint slide format
Tagged Image File Format, abbreviated TIFF or TIF, is a computer file format for storing raster graphics images
PNG is a file format for image compression
Microsoft Word document format
Portable Document Format
Hierarchical Data Format (HDF) is a set of file formats (HDF4, HDF5) designed to store and organize large amounts of data
FASTA format is a text-based format for representing either nucleotide sequences or peptide sequences, in which nucleotides or amino acids are represented using single-letter codes

FASTQ format is a text-based format for storing both a biological sequence (usually nucleotide sequence) and its corresponding quality scores. Both the sequence letter and quality score are each encoded with a single ASCII character for brevity
Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) format for alignment of nucleotide sequences (e.g. sequencing reads) to (a) reference sequence(s)
Variant Call Format (VCF) for sequence variation (indels, polymorphisms, structural variation)
BCF, the binary version of Variant Call Format (VCF) for sequence variation (indels, polymorphisms, structural variation)
Multiple Alignment Format (MAF) supporting alignments of whole genomes with rearrangements, directions, multiple pieces to the alignment, and so forth
Browser Extensible Data (BED) format of sequence annotation track, typically to be displayed in a genome browser
CHP file contains probe set analysis results generated from Affymetrix software
Format of Affymetrix data file of information about (raw) expression levels of the individual probes
SIF (simple interaction file) Format - a network/pathway format used for instance in cytoscape
Tabular data represented as tab-separated values in a text file
Tabular data represented as comma-separated values in a text file
Textual format
Any Plink file format (MAP/PED/BED)
bigWig format for large sequence annotation tracks that consist of a value for each sequence position
Wiggle format (WIG) of a sequence annotation track that consists of a value for each sequence position
Tab-delimited text files of GenePattern that contain a column for each sample, a row for each gene, and an expression value for each gene in each sample
Blocked GNU Zip format
SEG file (segmented data; .seg or .cbs) is a tab-delimited text file that lists loci and associated numeric values
HTML format
Markdown (MD) is a lightweight markup language with plain text formatting syntax
Output of samtools flagstat tool
Gene transfer format (GTF) is a file format used to hold information about gene structure
Proprietary file format for mass spectrometry data from Thermo Scientific
Proprietary mass-spectrometry format of Thermo Scientific's ProteomeDiscoverer software
markdown document specific to r analyses
This format is used to provide called peaks of signal enrichment based on pooled, normalized (interpreted) data. It is a BED6+4 format.
This format is used to provide called regions of signal enrichment based on pooled, normalized (interpreted) data. It is a BED 6+3 format.

This format is used to provide called regions of signal enrichment based on pooled, normalized (interpreted) data where the regions may be spliced or incorporate gaps in the genomic sequence. It is a BED12+3 format.
AVI files can contain both audio and video data in a file container that allows synchronous audio-with-video playback.
A PZFX file is a Prism project created by GraphPad Prism, a scientific application used to analyze and graph data. It contains project data including graphs and layouts, notes, and tables.
Line drawing saved in the Xfig format; stored as a vector image that may include lines, shapes, arcs, splines, arrows, and text objects; may also include images, colors, and patterns.
eXtensible Markup Language (XML) format.
tape archive
R Script
The Axonâ„¢ Binary File format (ABF) was created for the storage of binary experimental data.
A beaded pool manifest. Describe the SNP or probe content on a BeadChip or in an assay pool.
Format of Affymetrix data file of raw image data.
Joint Picture Group file format for lossy graphics file.
Illumina iScan bead location file.
